q: Trade unions and politicians have already accused Sergio Marchionne of`` blackmail'' in pushing through a tough deal on working conditions at Fiat's flagship Mirafiori plant in Turin to save the factory from closure. Fiat is a great multinational which is growing in the world but its heart remaine Italian, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said Saturday, adding,`` All arguments are now closed. Romanni had said Monday that he would be asking Sergio Marchionne `` to commit to investing in our country and remain with head and heart'' in Italy. He notes the need for new business models and an increase in innovation. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
